identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

headings.usage: Use for all headings (H1-H6). Tight tracking (-0.02em) for large text.

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, UI labels, and inputs. Readable and neutral.

mono.usage: Use for file specs, prices, and technical details.

rules: Overlines/Labels must be uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs.
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body.
Primary Color (Blue) is ONLY for the main CTA (Buy Now, Checkout).
No gradients on buttons. Solid, high-contrast colors.
Admin Dashboard: Use white bg with distinct black borders for separation.
Text Color: Never pure black (#000) on white. Use #0a0a0a.

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid #e5e5e5 (Light Gray) for subtle separation. 1px solid #000 (Black) for active/focus states.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-md (6px) or rounded-none for a brutalist feel.
visual_enhancers.shadows: No shadows by default. 'shadow-xl' on hover for product cards.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly on sticky headers: backdrop-blur-xl + bg-white/80 + border-b border-black/5.
visual_enhancers.texture: Add subtle grain to the background of the Hero section if possible.

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 where others use p-4.

grids.marketing: The Tetris Grid (Bento). Mix col-span-1, col-span-2, row-span-2 for variety.
grids.admin: Strict 12-column grid. Sidebar fixed width (250px). Content area fluid.

containers.cards: Aspect ratio 1:1 or 4:3 for product thumbnails. Clean, white bg, no border, just image + text below.

buttons.style: h-10 px-8 rounded-md font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95

cards.product: Group relative. Image aspect-square bg-gray-100 rounded-md overflow-hidden. Title and Price below. Hover: Image slight zoom.
cards.dashboard_stat: p-6 border rounded-md bg-white. No shadow. Bold metric number.

inputs.style: h-11 rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm shadow-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring

navigation.header: Sticky. White/80 blur. Minimal logo. Links: Text only, hover underline.
navigation.sidebar: Fixed left. 250px wide. Border-r. Links: Ghost button style, full width, justify-start.

Abstract wavy shapes on black. Use for 'Dark Mode' toggle or specific section backgrounds.
Minimalist desk setup with screens. Use for Admin Login page side image.
Clean white business card mockup on textile. Use as Product Thumbnail.
Dynamic 3D geometric shapes blue. Use as Product Thumbnail for '3D Assets'.
Poster with text. Use as Product Thumbnail for 'Print Templates'.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SYSTEM: This is a Digital Product Marketplace. Reliability and Clarity are paramount.
2. ADMIN: The Admin Dashboard must be high-density but readable. Use Tables with strict alignment.
3. STORE: The Storefront must feel like an Art Gallery. Large images, minimal text.
4. IMAGES: Use the provided Asset URLs. DO NOT use placeholders.
5. MOCKUP: If a specific image is missing, reuse the 'Abstract 3D' image with a different crop/filter.
6. TESTING: Add data-testid to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards).
7. TECH: Use standard HTML/CSS for marketing layouts to ensure 'Bento' grid flexibility. Use Shadcn for interactive components (modals, forms).
8. THEME: Default to LIGHT mode. It's a professional tool. Dark mode can be an option but prioritize Light.
universal_guidelines: Use glass-morphism with 24px blur for headers.
